channel.title: WebClient Error
channel.description:
I've set up my web client onto my Freewebs website and it's showing up with something like this. Blank white screen with [i]error message[/i] in the corner. [IMG]http://i299.photobucket.com/albums/mm305/sqeker07/WEBCLIENT.jpg[/img] I then click on the [i]error message[/i], this pops up. [IMG]http://i299.photobucket.com/albums/mm305/sqeker07/webclient1.jpg[/img] I click [i]Details[/i] on the pop up window, and this shows up. [IMG]http://i299.photobucket.com/albums/mm305/sqeker07/webclient33.jpg[/img] HERE IS THE ERROR CODE THAT POPS UP. [code]Java Plug-in 1.6.0_18 Using JRE version 1.6.0_18-b07 Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM User home directory = C:\Documents and Settings\Owner ---------------------------------------------------- c: clear console window f: finalize objects on finalization queue g: garbage collect h: display this help message l: dump classloader list m: print memory usage o: trigger logging q: hide console r: reload policy configuration s: dump system and deployment properties t: dump thread list v: dump thread stack x: clear classloader cache 0-5: set trace level to ---------------------------------------------------- load: class client.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.IOException: Stream closed. at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.available(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.available(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedInputStream.available(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.ChunkedInputStream.readAheadNonBlocking(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.ChunkedInputStream.readAhead(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.ChunkedInputStream.available(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.MeteredStream.available(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ... 7 more Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class[/code] WebClient is:
http://dreamflag.webs.com/

item.title: WebClient Error
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“Ikoedlalampara, post:6, topic:328308”]webclients suck
/topic[/quote]

you suck
/you

@topic: i dont know that much about webclients, but i would try either a different site, or redo the webclient making process and go over everything carefully to make sure you havent forgotten anything.

Read full topic

item.title: WebClient Error
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

this has nothing to do with the site builder.
you forgot to add something.
redo your webclient
very carefuly.
ive had the same error, and ive done my webclient in freewebs.

Read full topic

item.title: WebClient Error
item.dc:creator: @sqeker sqeker
item.description:
@sqeker wrote:

I’ve set up my web client onto my Freewebs website and it’s showing up with something like this.

Blank white screen with error message in the corner.

WEBCLIENT.jpg799×531

I then click on the error message, this pops up.

webclient1.jpg772×516

I click Details on the pop up window, and this shows up.

webclient33.jpg750×582

HERE IS THE ERROR CODE THAT POPS UP.

[code]Java Plug-in 1.6.0_18
Using JRE version 1.6.0_18-b07 Java HotSpot™ Client VM
User home directory = C:\Documents and Settings\Owner

c: clear console window
f: finalize objects on finalization queue
g: garbage collect
h: display this help message
l: dump classloader list
m: print memory usage
o: trigger logging
q: hide console
r: reload policy configuration
s: dump system and deployment properties
t: dump thread list
v: dump thread stack
x: clear classloader cache
0-5: set trace level to

load: class client.class not found.
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Caused by: java.io.IOException: Stream closed.
at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.available(Unknown Source)
at java.net.SocketInputStream.available(Unknown Source)
at java.io.BufferedInputStream.available(Unknown Source)
at sun.net.www.http.ChunkedInputStream.readAheadNonBlocking(Unknown Source)
at sun.net.www.http.ChunkedInputStream.readAhead(Unknown Source)
at sun.net.www.http.ChunkedInputStream.available(Unknown Source)
at sun.net.www.MeteredStream.available(Unknown Source)
at java.io.BufferedInputStream.read(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
… 7 more
Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class[/code]

WebClient is:

http://dreamflag.webs.com/
